headline: SmartBear CrossBrowserTesting review
description: SmartBear CrossBrowserTesting is a great product for manual and automated testing on a large number of devices. Read our review of SmartBear CrossBrowserTesting - a browser testing tool.

offers.description: Unlimited Testing (desktop and mobile, per month)

negativeNotes: High network latency during live testing
Localization testing not possible without additinal setup
positiveNotes: Powerful API available to run tests from command line
Large number of real devices and browsers available for testing
Full page screenshots can be captured automatically at scale

author.name: Naman Singhal
author.description: Naman has a background in computer science and has published research with IEEE on predicting software bugs using machine learning models.

name: Browser testing tool
reviewBody: SmartBear CrossBrowserTesting provides both automated and live tests across multiple platforms and devices going back to Windows XP and iOS 4. The large number of integrations and frameworks makes it particularly powerful.
